channel.title: How do you make your server 24.7?
channel.description: I really want to know this info, my server always restarts

item.title: How do you make your server 24.7?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“pass the java, post:8, topic:51760”][quote author=lothy link=topic=72683.msg827811#msg827811 date=1169891669]

the auto restarter is incase theres a crash, so if it crashes it’ll restart server in 40 mins if you made it restart every 40 mins

Servers wouldn’t crash if they weren’t so shit.
[/quote]

Lothy has a good point. PvpScape owns[/quote]
To be honest, my server is no exception. It was built from cheezscape like lots of other servers, and frankly cheezscape sucks.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make your server 24.7?

item.title: How do you make your server 24.7?
item.dc:creator: @eggy0095 eggy0095
item.description:
@eggy0095 wrote:

u want a sever up 24/7?
heres the ezy way which will cost u under $80 4eva
buy the worst box u can find connect it to the internet put a copy of u sever on it and run it. make sure it has a auto-restarter and just leave it on wow that was hard…

item.title: How do you make your server 24.7?

item.description:
@tasty_noob wrote:

dedicated its the only way. Unless you want your computer to die before its time. Dedicated costs like $89 min?

Its usefull to host a site/server.

Auto-restarters do almost nothing.

item.title: How do you make your server 24.7?

item.description:
@pass_the_java wrote:

KiIIer:

the restarter is the thing that keeps it 24/7. However I highly doubt anyone can do 24/7 without an extremely good computer…

read my sig k?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 26, 2007, 11:32:26 PM[/size][hr][quote=“lothy, post:7, topic:51760”][quote author=dark_child link=topic=72683.msg827737#msg827737 date=1169890860]
the auto restarter is incase theres a crash, so if it crashes it’ll restart server in 40 mins if you made it restart every 40 mins
[/quote]
Servers wouldn’t crash if they weren’t so shit.[/quote]

Lothy has a good point. PvpScape owns

item.title: How do you make your server 24.7?
item.dc:creator: @mod_abyssal mod abyssal
item.description:
@mod_abyssal wrote:

I just leave my computer on 24-7 and have my comp puttied to a friends…he lives in Australia so he rests while im asleep, or the other way around auto reseters are good too if you can leave the comp up without it freezing after a few hours of not using it

Read full topic
